languages.text: "Научишься в процессе. Оставляю тебя за главную, Мейв".

traits.locale_text: "Научишься в процессе. Оставляю тебя за главную, Лидзи".

languages.text: "You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."
languages.original_text: "Научишься в процессе. Оставляю тебя за главную, Мейв".

traits.locale_text: "You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."
"You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."
"You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."
"You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."
"You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."
"You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."

languages.text: “你会慢慢学会的。这颗行星就由你来负责了，梅芙。”
languages.original_text: "You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."

traits.locale_text: “你会慢慢学会的。这颗行星就由你来负责了，梅芙。”

languages.text: 「君は進みながら学ぶだろう。メイヴ、君をここに残していくよ」
languages.original_text: "You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."

traits.locale_text: 「君は進みながら学ぶだろう。メイヴ、君をここに残していくよ」

languages.text: «Aprenderás sobre la marcha. Te dejo al mando, Maive».
languages.original_text: "You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."

traits.locale_text: «Aprenderás sobre la marcha. Te dejo al mando, Maive».

languages.text: "İşini yaptıkça öğrenirsin. Buranın başına seni geçiriyorum Maive."
languages.original_text: "You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."

traits.locale_text: "İşini yaptıkça öğrenirsin. Buranın başına seni geçiriyorum Maive."

languages.text: « Vous apprendrez sur le tas. Je vous confie les rênes, Maive. »
languages.original_text: "You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."

traits.locale_text: « Vous apprendrez sur le tas. Je vous confie les rênes, Maive. »

languages.text: "Das werdet Ihr schon lernen. Hiermit übergebe ich Euch die Verantwortung, Maive."
languages.original_text: "You will learn as you go. I am leaving you in charge, Maive."

traits.locale_text: "Das werdet Ihr schon lernen. Hiermit übergebe ich Euch die Verantwortung, Maive."
